Marybeth Kram

Marybeth is an improv and comedy performer and writer in Chicago.

Email marybethkram at gmail dot com for specifics on upcoming shows!

Clued In

Improvised murder-mystery, in the style of Agatha Christie.
Saturdays @7:30 - Buy tickets at Second City.

Fright

Improvised horror movie, with audience participation!
Sundays @7:00 - Buy tickets at iO Theater.
